description: T1 Sycamore x 1 (Acer pseudoplatanus) Deadwood 50mm> over high traffic areas and pathway See Map; T2 Indian Bean Tree x  1 (Catalpa bignonioides) Lift by 2m and deadwood 50mm> over high traffic area See Map; T3 Sycamore x 1 (Acer pseudoplatanus) Deadwood 40mm> See Map; T4 Norway Maple x 1 (Acer platanoides) Lift over pathway by 3m and deadwood See Map; T5 Cherry x 1 (Prunus spp) Major deadwood over playground and lift by up to 2m See Map; T6 Cherry x 1 (Prunus spp) Deadwood 10mm> See Map;T7 Sycamore x 1 (Acer pseudoplatanus) Deadwood 20mm>; T8 Hornbeam (Carpinus betulus) Reduce all over by up to 2m, lift by 3m and balance to reduce back from neighbouring property
